medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment by which the sender uniquely identifies the Utilities master data message by means of its name and number and its function.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying general dates related to the whole message and the time zone used in the message. The segment must be specified at least once to specify the message date as allocated by the sender.

medi:segment.name: Market/sales channel information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MKS, A segment to specify to which market the object relates.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segment.name: Transport service requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TSR, A segment to identify the transport service such as express or normal when the message is used to provide transport routing information for multiple transport products. This information may determine which transport route might be used to carry goods from one shipper to one location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments giving references and, where necessary, their dates relating to the whole message.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference by its type and number, such as references to an earlier sent messages or a contract number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date/time related to the referenced information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying the parties with associated information relevant to the whole message, such as the sender and the receiver of the message.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment for specifying the identification and/or the name and the address of the party, in coded or clear form, and the function relevant to the message. It is recommended that, if possible, only the coded form of the party ID should be specified.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment for inclusion of any references related to the current party, such as fiscal number or government reference number.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, A segment to identify an account and a related financial institution connected to the current party.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment used to identify attributes of the relevant party, such as additional functions of the sender or receiver.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments giving contact details of a specific person and/or department within the party identified.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person and/or department, and their function, to whom communications should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication type and number for the contact specified.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: TSR-SG5-SG6-SG7-SG8-SG11-SG12 A group of segments providing details and characteristics of an object, such as a metering point.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, A segment starting a new set of master data for an object, and identifying the type of object, such as a metering point.

medi:segment.name: Line item
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LIN, A segment providing identification of the quantity in the lower- level object specified, such as a product code.

medi:segment.name: Additional product id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PIA, A segment providing additional identification to the object specified.

medi:segment.name: Item description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IMD, A segment for describing the object being reported. The segment may be used for specification of the use of the object (e.g. the type of consumption or production in the object).

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify dates associated with the object.

medi:segment.name: Process identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRC, A segment to specify to which business activity phase the object relates.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment giving a status for the object, such as active or closed.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment to specify relevant duty/tax/fee information, such as value added tax percentage.

medi:segment.name: Priority
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PTY, A segment for communication of priority information, such as if an installation is disconnectable or not.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segment.name: Agreement identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: AGR, A segment for specifying agreement details connected to the object, such as the type of contract.

medi:segment.name: Parties and instruction
medi:segment.medi:documentation: INP, A segment to specify parties to an instruction, the instruction, or both, such as instruction to read a meter.

medi:segment.name: Transport service requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TSR, A segment to identify the transport service such as express or normal when the message is used to provide transport routing information. This information may determine which transport route might be used to carry goods from one shipper to one location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments identifying locations connected to the object, such as a metered grid area or a metering point and its position in a hierarchy.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to identify locations connected to the object, such as a metered grid area or a metering point.

medi:segment.name: Hierarchy information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HYN, A segment to identify hierarchical connections from a given location to a higher or lower leveled location, such as the connections between an aggregated metering point to the lover level metering points.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments for specifying any references and associated dates valid for the object.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying any references related to the object, such as a transaction reference number or a reference to a time series.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify any dates associated with the current reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments providing characteristics and characteristic details connected to the object.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic/class id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CCI, A segment to identify characteristic and/or the characteristic name and characteristic relevance for the object, such as method for balance settlement or measurement method, number of digits of a meter etc.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic value
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CAV, A segment to specify the value of the characteristic previously defined in either coded form or in free format.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments to specify quantities, characteristics and references of lower-level objects related to the current object, such as meters and/or registers of a meter.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment to provide a sequence number of the lower-level objects, such as the register number within a meter.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying any references related to the lower- level object, such as a register number or a reference to a contract.

medi:segment.name: Additional product id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PIA, A segment providing additional product identification connected to the lower-level object, such as a register of a meter.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: group of segments providing quantities connected to the lower-level object.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying the quantity details, such as estimated annual consumption or production.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify dates or periods related to the previously specified quantity information.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment giving the status for the quantity, such as metered, estimated or corrected.

medi:segment.name: Line item
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LIN, A segment providing identification of the quantity in the lower-level object specified, such as a product code.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments providing characteristics and characteristic details connected to the lower-level object.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic/class id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CCI, A segment to identify a characteristic and/or the characteristic name and characteristic relevance for the lower-level object, such as number of digits of a meter etc.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic value
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CAV, A segment to specify the value of the characteristic previously defined in either coded form or in free format.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments for specifying monetary amounts related to the object and connected references and dates, such as grid access fee.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment for specifying monetary amounts related to the object.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment for identifying a reference to the amount.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date/time related to the referenced information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments identifying parties related to the object or service, with associated information, such as end user, installation, invoicee, etc.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment for specifying the identification and/or the name and address of the party, in coded or clear form, and the functions relevant to the object or service. It is recommended that, if possible, only the coded form of the party identification should be specified.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment for inclusion of any references related to the current party, such as fiscal number or government reference number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and/or the time related to the referenced information, such as the date of birth for the end user.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, A segment to identify an account and a related financial institution connected to the current party.

medi:segment.name: Language
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LAN, A segment to indicate the langauges for the specified party.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments giving contact details of a specific person and/or department within the party identified.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person and/or department, and their function, to whom communications should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication type and number for the contact specified.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment by which control totals may be sent by the sender for checking by the receiver.
